content:
Sure, here's a shorter version:

Community Sand Gathering Event:

* Invite the Sheffield community to bring a box of sand to contribute to a sandbox project
* Participants will have a chance to share a sentence about what they want to change in the community before pouring their sand into a designated area
* The collected sand will be used to create a community sandbox
* The event will serve as a way to bring people together and show that change is possible when we work together
